strings.Value: "Nilak, you did not hesitate to sacrifice yourself to save the tribe. This is the act of a true leader!"
"Nilak, sacrificing yourself is foolish sentimentality, unworthy of a ruler."
"What are you going to do next?"
"Farewell!"
"A time of great change has come to your tribe."
"Amiri... That was my duty."
"Amiri! After what you've done, his brother will return and destroy us all!"
"We will leave soon. Thank you and Amiri for what you have done for us."
"Enough complaining! Your duty is to take care of these dumb-heads. Without you they won't survive in the south — and you can't go north anymore."
"The old fart volunteered for it. — Finally did something good in his life. Give him a good funeral."
"I had a blood debt to this tribe. I would not want the daughter of someone I killed to come take their revenge on me!"
"Hah! What, one more giant to beat? Relax! Together with this {mf|man|girl} we'll send anyone into the ground!" {n}Amiri smiles wide and slaps you on the shoulder.{/n}
"Oh, Amiri... I see you've found a chieftain to your liking!"
"We will."
"You've paid your debt in full. The whole tribe owes you their lives."
"Thank you. It's an honor for me to hear your praise."
"This is the way of my tribe. If I was not ready for it, I would not agree to be chieftain."

"Let's go back to {g|Numeria}Numeria{/g}! We are not used to change. Even there, everything seems strange to us — but Numerian kellids are not so different from the northern ones! We would not survive here in the {g|River Kingdoms}River Kingdoms{/g}, even with your protection."
"{g|Desna}Desna{/g} bless you! Look after Amiri!"

"Everything changes. It's foolish to believe we can hide from the whole world in our icy mountains. We paid dearly for pretending that time doesn't touch us. I'm afraid the other tribes will pay even more."
